text: It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.
It takes an iron will and unnatural - supernatural - strength to rally bound troops routed by magical means.
Nagash's Grand Vizier Arkhan is masterfully adept in the art of Necromancy that he can summon forth endless hordes of undead minions to do his bidding.
As the powers of Dark Magic are wielded for the purpose of Necromancy, its unwholesome energies invigorate the Undead.
From the battlefield, Arkhan siphons the soulstuff of the fallen, restoring damage done to his undead minions.
Slain warriors and monsters are bound and summoned to fight once again for their master.
Binding the very essence to new corporeal bodies restores and resurrects the undead legion, ever serving and ever loyal.
"Let the splintered bones burrow from the grave pall. Let cold fingers grip tomb-worn blades, and unseeing eyes survey the fields of slaughter. For your time has come once more."
"Let the splintered bones burrow from the grave pall. Let cold fingers grip tomb-worn blades, and unseeing eyes survey the fields of slaughter. For your time has come once more."
The ethereal sythes of Cairn Wraiths become more effective the longer the battle rages and the greater the number of piteous souls they harvest.
